{{About||{{MCE}} plants|MCE:Plant|{{MCD}} mobs that resemble plants|MCD:Natural}}
{{About||the organisms that include ''mushrooms''|Fungus|the organisms that include ''algae'' and ''corals''|Aquatic organism|fungi-like organisms that inhabit [[deep dark biome]]|Sculk family}}

A '''plant''' can either be a plant [[structure]] or a plant [[block]]. A '''plant structure''' is composed entirely of '''plant blocks''', which includes [[flower]]s, [[leaves]], [[log]]s, [[propagule]]s, [[roots]], and [[crops]]. Aquatic plants can be found in water, and terrestial plants can be found on land. Most plant blocks are [[renewable]], generally by growing them. All plants can be put in the [[composter]]. Some plants and other vegetative bodies can generate underground. Some plants are affected by [[light]], [[water]], [[weather]], [[biome]], or their proximity to certain blocks.

Many [[food]] items are also made from plants, but are not listed here, because they are the [[crafting]] products of plants.
